info.title: Plan API
info.description:
# Overview
The Plan API enables programmatic access to information on Plans.

get.description: Returns all plans configured for the user's company.

externalDocs.description: Knowledge base article fully describing the content of a Plan JSON object.

v202501alpha1DeviceSubtype.description:
- DEVICE_SUBTYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified (default value)
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_A10_CGN: A10 CGN
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_ADVANCED_SFLOW: Advanced sFlow
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_AWS_SUBNET: Amazon Web Services
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_AZURE_SUBNET: Microsoft Azure
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_CISCO_ASA: Cisco ASA
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_CISCO_ASA_SYSLOG: Cisco ASA (Syslog)
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_CISCO_NBAR: Cisco NBAR-Enabled Router
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_CISCO_NVZFLOW: Cisco nvzFlow
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_CISCO_SDWAN_XE: Cisco SD-WAN IOS XE
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_CISCO_ZONE_BASED_FIREWALL: Cisco Zone-Based Firewall
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_DARKNET: Kentik-internal value, darknet stream
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_FORTINET_FORTIGATE: Fortinet FortiGate
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_GCP_CLOUD_RUN: Google Cloud Run
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_GCP_SUBNET: Google Cloud Platform
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_GIGAMON: Gigamon Network Tap
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_IBM_SUBNET: IBM Cloud Platform
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_IOS_XR: Cisco IOS XR
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_ISTIO: Istio (Beta)
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_JUNIPER_DDOS: Juniper DDoS Flow
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_KAGENT: kentik agent
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_KAPPA: Process-Aware Telemetry Agent
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_KMETRICS: Virtual device for storing kmetrics data
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_KPROBE: Kentik Host Agent (kprobe)
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_KROBE_TAP: kProbe True Origin Tap
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_KPROXY: kproxy agent
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_MERAKI: Cisco Meraki
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_MPLS: MPLS Router
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_NOKIALAYER2: Nokia Layer 2
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_NPROBE: ntop Host Agent (nProbe)
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_OCI_FLOW_LOG: OCI Flow Log
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_OCI_SUBNET: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_OPEN_NMS: OpenNMS SNMP Export Device
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_PALOALTO: Palo Alto Networks Firewall
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_PALOALTO_PRISMASDWAN: Palo Alto Prisma SD-WAN
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_PFE_SYSLOG: Juniper PFE (Syslog)
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_ROUTER: NetFlow-Enabled Router
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_SFLOW_TUNNEL: sFlow Tunnel decode
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_SILVERPEAK: Silver Peak EdgeConnect
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_SYSLOG: Generic Syslog
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_VERSA: Versa
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_VIPTELA: Cisco SDWAN vEdge
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_VMWARE_VELOCLOUD: VMware SD-WAN
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_VMWARE_VSPHERE: VMWare vSphere
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_VXLAN: VXLAN
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_KSYNTH: Kentik-internal value
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_SDM_LEADER: Kentik-internal value
 - DEVICE_SUBTYPE_HOST_NPROBE_DNS_WWW: Kentik-internal value
v202501alpha1DeviceSubtype.title:
Device Subtype Enum (see https://kb.kentik.com/v4/Cb01.htm#Cb01-Supported_Device_Types)
note, this could be moved to a shared location if used by other services

id.description: The system-assigned unique ID of the plan.

companyId.description: The system-assigned unique ID of your organization.

name.description: A name for the plan. Every Kentik customer is initially provided with a plan called "Default."

description.description: An optional description of the plan.

active.description: Indicates if the plan is currently activated.

maxDevices.description: The maximum number of devices that can send flow records to Kentik under this plan.

maxFps.description: Per device limit on flow records per second that can be sent to Kentik (excess FPS may trigger rate-limiting).

bgpEnabled.description: Indicates whether or not devices on this plan may be peered to enable Kentik to collect BGP routing data.

fastRetention.description: The number of days that data will be stored in the Fast dataseries.

fullRetention.description: The number of days that data will be stored in the Full dataseries.

createdDate.description: The system-assigned date-time of filter creation, in UTC.

updatedDate.description: The system-assigned date-time of most-recent modification, in UTC.

maxBigdataFps.description: Max FPS applied to fast data rollups.

devices.description: The devices currently assigned to this plan.

metadata.description: Additional custom metadata associated with the plan.

id.description: The system-assigned unique ID of a device associated with this plan.

deviceName.description: The user-assigned name of a device associated with this plan.

v202501alpha1PlanDevice.description: Represents a device that is associated with a plan.
